summary: This makes the silver swords appear more like real silver.
descriptionHtml:
[u]Description[/u]

This makes the silver swords appear more like real silver, this was done by making the textures brighter. Only changes the appearance of the swords, the stats have been left unchanged.

[u]Installation[/u]

Use Nexus Mod Manager to install the mod.

Manual installation:
Extract the 7zip archive using Winrar or 7Zip, drop the Data folder in your Skyrim folder.

[u]Uninstallation[/u]

Use Nexus Mod Manager to uninstall the mod.

Manual uninstallation:
Remove the following file: Data\Textures\Weapons\Silver\silversword.dds

[u]Credits[/u]

Thanks to Xenius for helping me getting started with modding.
author: pascaliedema
